versions.title: BlackLogics v0.0.1
versions.description: Initial public alpha version of BlackLogics. Basic drag‑and‑drop UI editor with foundational block logic system. Good for testing core features.

versions.title: BlackLogics v0.0.3
versions.description: Minor update focusing on internal fixes and preparation for feature rollout.

versions.title: BlackLogics v0.0.4-alpha4
versions.description: Added widgets icons, preliminary Web to APK export, improved UI and other small enhancements based on community feedback.

versions.title: BlackLogics v0.0.5
versions.description: May be final pre‑1.0 release. Resource encryption, bottom sheet dialogs, UI overhauls, improved custom blocks, code generation upgrades, and enhanced AndroidX support.

description: BlackLogics is an advanced open‑source visual Android app builder that lets anyone build apps without traditional coding by using a logic‑based system and drag‑and‑drop UI editor.
